channel.title: Home on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Basic HTML Elements
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me My name is Raiford Brookshire. I have been working in the Software business for a couple decades now and have spent a better part of my life designing, developing and deploying some very exciting Software. Over the past several years I have been working with Microsoft based technology and more specifially engineering solutions for Microsoft Azure Cloud Platform. I am very enthusiastic about recent developments in the way Software is created using languages such as C# / .

item.title: Resume
item.description: Raiford Doug Brookshire .NET / C# Developer (714) 277-8308 formulacoder@outlook.com .NET / C# / Developer My name is Raiford Brookshire, I am Microsoft .NET / C# / ASP.NET full stack software developer focusing on building Enterprise / Cloud software solutions using Microsoft Azure as a platform. I have significant experience integrating and developing with WebApi, Service Bus, Sql Database, Mobile Services and most of the .NET & Azure platform and mobile services.
